channel.title: BUGS bunny
channel.description: Um, sometimes my character turns into a default character with dwarf remains equipped everywhere. Why is this happening and how do I remove this bug, if it is one o.0

item.title: BUGS bunny
item.dc:creator: @mawang mawang
item.description:
@mawang wrote:

ya, but I am using the client they provided. this is the error i get.

Starting System…
Enforcing client requirement.
Settings Loaded Seccessfully!
Online.
Handlers Finished Loading
Connection from ******************************* (remain hidden for obvious reasons)
For input string: “0 0 0”
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: “0 0 0”
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499)
at client.loadgame(client.java:10395)
at client.run(client.java:18687)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

Read full topic

item.title: BUGS bunny
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

mawang:

Um, sometimes my character turns into a default character with dwarf remains equipped everywhere. Why is this happening and how do I remove this bug, if it is one o.0

this happens when you use a different client than the one provided by the maker because of custom or basic item ids.
